Description
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322
RFC 5322 Internet Message Format parsing and generation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth
Email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) for SMTP.

SMTP client handler and state interfaces.

SMTP server handler interfaces.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322 used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322
    Class
    Description
    EmailAddress
    This class represents an Internet email address using the syntax of RFC 5322.
    MessageHandler
    Receive notification of the logical content of an RFC 5322 email message.
    ObsoleteStructureType
    Types of obsolete but recoverable message structures that may be detected during parsing.
